extends java.lang.Object

        Constructor used when the Server Optimal protocol is used
        Parameters:
        username - The username of the user
        password - The password of the user
        website - The website which the user wants to connect to
        bsk - The bsk of the user
        bvk - The bvk of the user
        ssk - The ssk of the user
        r - The blind factor of the user
